name: Thieving Kender
textDefeated: You only wish you could pickpocket your money back from the thief.

name: Rude Student
textDefeated: You have sent this student to permanent detention.

name: Baby Unicorn
textDefeated: You feel like a real jerk killing something so pretty.

name: Small Purple Mouse
textDefeated: It is written in black and white: this strange technicolor mouse is no more.

name: Grunting Piggy
textDefeated: Mmm...Bacon

name: Cherubically Charming Child
textDefeated: You think it was the alliteration that did him in.

name: Bar Fly
textDefeated: Good thing you got him before cirrhosis did!

name: Hiker
textDefeated: His last words were "...I must protect the dragon."

name: Batling
textDefeated: Silly batling!

name: Deranged Gnome
textDefeated: What happens when I do THIS?

name: Water Sprite
textDefeated: That was refreshing.

name: Cunning Sapling
textDefeated: Ah Ha! A toothpick!

name: Twig Man
textDefeated: I snapped him like a.. Well, twig.

name: Rabid Mouse
textDefeated: Those little teeth HURT!

name: Stray Cat
textDefeated: Finally! Peace in the night!

name: Big Hairy Spider
textDefeated: I *HATE* spiders!

name: Goblin Lackey
textDefeated: Who knew goblins had lackeys?

name: Crazy Chihuahua
textDefeated: Here taco, taco, taco.

name: Looney Rabbit
textDefeated: Th- Th- That's all folks!

name: Undead Oarsman
textDefeated: Funny... I didn't see any water around here.

name: Dumb Old Eyesore
textDefeated: All she ever did was nag...nag...nag...

name: Pygmy Marmoset
textDefeated: The strange little monkey falls from the trees and lies still.

name: Screaming Banshee
textDefeated: You plunge your weapon into her breast, silencing her song.

name: Ursa Minor
textDefeated: After an astronomical battle, Ursa Minor is the one seeing stars

name: Stone Troll
textDefeated: That troll is stone cold ugly.

name: Slithering Asp
textDefeated: You break the deadly gaze of the snake to save your own life.

name: Windan The Barbarian
textDefeated: He really was just a feather-weight

name: Studious Young Sorceror
textDefeated: Perhaps she should have studied harder.

name: Mr. Bear
textDefeated: Mr. Bear was too tired to finish playing with you and went back to napping.

name: Camper
textDefeated: With her dying breath she gasps "...and I never saw the dragon."

name: Small Bat
textDefeated: The small mammal falls to the ground lifeless.

name: Insane Bard
textDefeated: Slings and Arrows of outrageous fortune? Nope.  Just the can o' Whoopass.

name: Lost Ghostling
textDefeated: Well, I'm sure that helped him on his way...

name: Angry Titmouse
textDefeated: You swat the little bird out of the air with little effort.

name: Fabianist Youth Member
textDefeated: Socialize THAT.

name: Little Bogeyman
textDefeated: Hmm, not so scary when you have grown up...

name: Coblynau
textDefeated: Maybe I better leave him part of my lunch next time.

name: Jack O'Lantern
textDefeated: The light has gone out of his life.

name: Fresh Ghoul
textDefeated: You leave him to the mercies of the other ghouls.

name: Dry Skeleton
textDefeated: The skeleton crumbles into a pile of dust.

name: Newly Dead Zombie
textDefeated: Maybe now it can rest in peace.

name: Faerie hound
textDefeated: The embers in the eye sockets dim and sputter out.

name: Four and Twenty Blackbirds
textDefeated: Now isn't this a dainty dish to set before a king?

name: Amazon
textDefeated: The beautiful warrior lass has lost a battle for the first time.

name: Overbearing Mother
textDefeated: With one fell swoop you save your social life!

name: Huge Bald Programmer
textDefeated: You feel as if you have seen this man before in the village.

name: Someone's Grandfather
textDefeated: This reminds you of the time you needed a new heel for your shoe.

name: Juvenile Delinquent
textDefeated: With a satisfying thump, you knock the smirk right off his face.

name: Beautiful Woodland Sprite
textDefeated: You really cut that wood sprite down to size.

name: Society Belle
textDefeated: Now she will never be on time for the ball!

name: Giant Goldfish Cracker
textDefeated: Now *there* is a fish that smiled till you bit his head off.

name: Swarming Ladybugs
textDefeated: Those Ladybugs weren't very ladylike.

name: The Gar Man
textDefeated: There is but one Gar Man!  And now he's just fluff!

name: Forest Ranger
textDefeated: In his pack you find a copy of "Dragon Seeking for Dummies."

name: Medium Sized Bat
textDefeated: You killed it just to shut it up.

name: Water Nymph
textDefeated: I didn't need a bath, thank you.

name: Big Bogeyman
weapon: Fingers poking you as you sleep.
textDefeated: Ok... that was weird.  But not scary... Nope not at all... I think I'll leave the light on at the inn tonight though.

name: Apprentice Necromancer
textDefeated: He gasps a final breath and melts into a tarry liquid.

name: Doppleganger
textDefeated: You kill the doppleganger and he returns to his true form.

name: Forest Thief
textDefeated: His pockets were almost empty. I guess he wasn't much of a thief.

name: Mouldy Skeleton
textDefeated: Heeeeey, didn't you see him in town last week?

name: Angry Fairy
textDefeated: He disappears in a cloud of fairy dust.

name: Goblin Hunter
textDefeated: Only one? Don't they usually travel in packs?

name: Bobcat Cub
textDefeated: Even the cute fuzzy kittens are evil in this place.

name: Animate Junkheap
textDefeated: Just call you the De-Animator!

name: Angry Mob
textDefeated: There is no justice for an angry mob.

name: Polar Bear
textDefeated: That bear really needed an attitude adjustment.

name: Decaying Skeleton
textDefeated: His leg ought to make a good toy for your dog.

name: Willie the Wonder Hampster
textDefeated: You smile a grim smile at Willie and quietly munch on some seeds.

name: Winged Demon Of Death
textDefeated: You cut off the Demon's head, to be sure of its death.

name: Small Dragon
textDefeated: For one moment you thought THIS was the Green Dragon, but alas not.

name: Monstrous Dustbunny
textDefeated: You sweep the poor bunny under the rug when no one is looking.

name: Small Rabbit
textDefeated: To think you almost ran away!

name: Little Cocobean
textDefeated: She really made your heart race and pound, but now she has crumbled to the ground

name: Iron Chef
textDefeated: You have rendered the Chef Ironless!  He's now simply a copper/tin alloy!

name: Tree-Hugger
textDefeated: The leaflet reads "Who Will Protect The Helpless Dragon?"

name: Large Bat
textDefeated: You feel the need to take a bath.

name: Necromancer
textDefeated: In a cloud of black smoke, his body wafts away on the breeze.

name: Reed Golem
textDefeated: The only thing left was a tiny bale of hay.

name: Goblin Shaman
textDefeated: "Oooga Booga", indeed.

name: Steam Spirit
textDefeated: Not so hot now, eh?

name: Restless Zombie
textDefeated: Finally he is at peace.

name: Zombie Soldier
textDefeated: His final orders were to march to hell.

name: Dark Imp
textDefeated: The imp implodes in a ball of flame.

name: Giant Spider
textDefeated: I really, really hate spiders.

name: Undead Kitten
textDefeated: Another evil cat sent to hell C.O.D.

name: Flying Dagger
textDefeated: The dagger shatters when it hits the ground.

name: Mature Unicorn
textDefeated: A unicorn is a thing of beauty, even in death.

name: Gnome Necromancer
textDefeated: Once you killed its familiar that Gnome was really weak.

name: Purple Dinosaur
textDefeated: There seems to be a person inside that strange dino.  You wonder why.

name: Orc Emmisary
textDefeated: You never were the diplomatic type.

name: Dark Spiritling
textDefeated: The spiritling gasps a final breath as you end its pitiful life.

name: Enchanted Toilet
textDefeated: That was just weird.

name: Giant Water Elemental
textDefeated: The giant creature is reduced a meager spring shower.

name: Violins
textDefeated: Won't someone PLEASE stop the violins?

name: Whirled Peas
textDefeated: We should all pray for whirled peas.

name: Haberdasher
textDefeated: Hats have gone out of style anyway.

name: Shining Happy People
textDefeated: They just wanted to be your friend.  You meanie.

name: Humongous Hairball
textDefeated: The hairball and all its accompanying gook have been washed out to sea!

name: Forest Dwelling Hermit
textDefeated: He speaks only these words as he dies: "You must leave the Dragon's Forest."

name: Giant Bat
textDefeated: Why do movie bats always fly at people's hair?

name: Pirate Tree
textDefeated: Arrrrrr! indeed.

name: Undead Centurion
textDefeated: Hmm Not too good at combat the second time around, either.

name: Goblin Warrior
textDefeated: Gone... and forgotten.

name: Experienced Necromancer
textDefeated: The necromancer turns into a pile of black sand and blows away.

name: Flame Sprite
textDefeated: You cooled him off in a hurry...

name: Mud Man
textDefeated: Defeated, the Mud Man dries up in the warm sun.

name: Lupe the Hypnotic Chihuahua
textDefeated: You manage to break free of those deep hypnotic eyes...

name: Ghoul
textDefeated: The ghoul falls to the ground, a bit of flesh between his teeth.

name: Seedy Cutthroat
textDefeated: One more bandit removed from this forest.

name: Ogre
textDefeated: Boy, thats a face not even a mother could love.

name: Crazy Woodsman
textDefeated: Chopped him down to size...

name: Flying Drakeling
textDefeated: You swat the small, majestic beast out of the air.

name: Magic Mushroom
textDefeated: Guess you don't need to go ask Alice now.

name: Invisible Man
textDefeated: You really aren't sure if it is dead, or just hiding...after all it is invisible.

name: Clown of Death
textDefeated: You give the clown's nose a honk just for fun before you leave.

name: Heart of Stone
textDefeated: Aww, now look, you broke its heart!

name: Troll Warrior
textDefeated: Wow, he smelled bad enough alive, can you imagine how he'll smell tomorrow?

name: Bettie the Amazing Kung-Fu Butterfly
textDefeated: You survived a battle to the death with a butterfly.  You must be so proud.

name: Golden Goose
textDefeated: You have slain the goose but it is too heavy to take back to town.  All that wealth wasted.

name: Black Tiger
textDefeated: You ponder the tiger's body thinking what a good rug it might make.

name: Lambert the Sheepish Lion
textDefeated: You marched in like a lion and he died like a lamb.

name: Football Fan
textDefeated: This fan doesn't have much to cheer about.

name: Member of Dragon Lovers Anonymous
textDefeated: When one wears a pin saying "Dragon Lovers Anonymous", they really are not as anonymous as they might think.

name: Vampire Batling
textDefeated: He resembled a mosquito more than a vampire bat.

name: Forest Cat
textDefeated: Here kitty, kitty, kitty.

name: Journeyman Necromancer
textDefeated: The necromancer drifts away on a cloud of black smoke.

name: Frigid Skeleton
textDefeated: I'll bet one of these guys could cool ale at the inn.

name: Frost Spirit
textDefeated: Puttin down another cold one.

name: Dragon Slayer's ghost
textDefeated: Everybody wondered what happened to him.

name: Ettin Mage
textDefeated: Two heads are not better than one in this case.  Just more to lop off.

name: Insane Brownie
textDefeated: This one's nuts!

name: Ghostly Wolfpack
textDefeated: Quiet settles in around you.  Finally.

name: Wood Golem
textDefeated: The truth gave you life and the truth set you free.

name: Diseased Ent
textDefeated: There must be fifty ways to cut your lumber. (Groan)

name: Marsha of the Jungle
textDefeated: Poor Marsha, she thought those monkeys were better trained.

name: Moe
textDefeated: Maybe those knives weren't so great.

name: Coffin
textDefeated: Best way to get rid of the coffin is Robitussin.

name: Green Alligator
textDefeated: Crikey!  That thing could have killed you!

name: Lindsey,  Daughter of Erin the Ninja Squirrel
textDefeated: All these squirrels are nuts.

name: Wizarding School Senior Student
textDefeated: Drat!  He took your memory before you killed him.  Who are you anyway?

name: Enchanted Laundry Basket
textDefeated: So that's what happens to lost socks!

name: Carrot Top
textDefeated: That has got to be the most satisfying kill you ever made.

name: Macintosh Computer
textDefeated: So THAT'S what happens when you right-click a Mac.

name: Sorority Girl in Nightie
textDefeated: It's too bad she's dead... you liked her action.

name: The Government
textDefeated: That's a tax return you'll be taking to the bank!

name: Methane Man
textDefeated: Must have been that bean he ate!

name: Initiate Dragon Watcher
textDefeated: All he could say was "Shhh, you are scaring the dragons!"

name: Small Vampire Bat
textDefeated: You kick at the annoying pest as it lies on the ground.

name: Dark Druid
textDefeated: He lost me at the corrupt it to save it part.

name: Lizard Man Scout
textDefeated: I know where I can get him made into a nice pair of boots.

name: Diabolic Footman
textDefeated: His armor sizzles and he melts as he crumples to the ground.

name: Gargantuan Tree Spider
textDefeated: After you lop him in half, you realize he's not so big.

name: Flaming Zombie
textDefeated: You extinguish the flame of life and the zombie falls to the ground, smoking.

name: Eldritch Wizard
textDefeated: You slice him in two only to watch his body disappear, leaving an empty robe behind.

name: Master Necromancer
textDefeated: You kill the necromancer and his minions disintegrate before your eyes.

name: Animate Darkness
weapon: The Darkness of a Thousand Nights
textDefeated: Light Slowly returns to this part of the forest.

name: Temple Guardian Statue
textDefeated: So, where's the temple?

name: Owlbear
textDefeated: I don't even want to know how they breed these.

name: Corporate Lackey
textDefeated: Well, you sure reprioritized his downsizing.

name: Interior Designer
textDefeated: You didn't like his style.

name: Daughter of the Devil
textDefeated: She is the girl your mom always warned you about.

name: Wild Horses
textDefeated: I guess the saying is true, wild horses can't drag you away.

name: Steam Elemental
textDefeated: There was just enough steam left to make an espresso.

name: Gordon the Cheese Eater
textDefeated: You sure cut that cheese....eater.

name: Narcoleptic
textDefeated: This narcoleptic won't be waking up anytime soon.

name: Swarm of Bees
textDefeated: You feel like a pincushion, but you are alive.

name: Halfling Mage
textDefeated: That fight wasn't half as difficult as you thought it would be.

name: Whopper With Cheese
textDefeated: This is one whopper that won't show up on your hips tomorrow.

name: Elsabutt
textDefeated: This is indeed a grave situation.

name: Wooly Mammoth
textDefeated: You climb atop the Mammoth's remains and declare yourself king (or queen) for a day!

name: Dragon Watcher, Junior Class'
textDefeated: You find a dragon-watching textbook in his backpack.

name: Medium Sized Vampire Bat
textDefeated: Who decides that this bat is a "Medium"?  Maybe he is a giant bat who hasn't bloomed yet.

name: The Man In Black
textDefeated: Finally, I got my chance to kill him.

name: Gnome Illusionist
textDefeated: It was all in his head.

name: Demon Skeleton
textDefeated: The spirits of its victims drag the skeleton back to hell.

name: Insane Master Druid
textDefeated: His evil laughter dies with him.

name: Water Elementalist
textDefeated: He's all wet.

name: Earth Elementalist
textDefeated: He fought kind of Dirty.

name: Ettin Warrior
textDefeated: They did all right until they hit each other.

name: Forest Giant
textDefeated: Ho, Ho, Ho that, green man.

name: Demoniac Knight
textDefeated: Good night, Sir Knight.

name: Giant Zombie
textDefeated: They DO smell worse when they are bigger!

name: SCO Lawyer
textDefeated: There's one lawyer who'll never trouble you again!

name: Citizen of Eythgim Village
textDefeated: Geeze, what did you ever do to him?

name: Old Hag
textDefeated: It is her turn to sleep an enchanted sleep.

name: Charging Buffalo
textDefeated: Do you know how to stop a charging buffalo?  Take away his credit card!

name: Pawn
textDefeated: Well, that was a bad move.

name: Romulan
textDefeated: You think to yourself they look tougher on TV.

name: Large Griffon
textDefeated: The mythical creature is no more.

name: Cliche Bond Movie Villain
textDefeated: Well, really, who throws a cell phone? I mean, that really, really hurt!

name: Fuzzy Ferret
textDefeated: Who knew ferrets were so violent!

name: Starving Artist
textDefeated: This guy really painted himself into a corner.

name: Crazy Audrey
textDefeated: With a well placed stomp, Audrey and the kittens are no more.

name: Dragon-watcher Senior Class
textDefeated: You find a copy of "Cave-Dwelling Dragons, and Where to Find Them" in his pack.

name: Huge Vampire Bat
textDefeated: You gave more blood to the Red Cross.

name: Old Man Winter
textDefeated: You shake your fist over his dead, pathetic corpse.

name: Frost Spectre
weapon: The Chill Touch of the Grave
textDefeated: As you recover from the fight, the Spectre melts away into the shadows.

name: Small Forest Dragon
textDefeated: Dragon? Check. Green? Check.  Huge? Nope.

name: A Pack of Carnivorous Lemurs
textDefeated: What the heck is a Lemur??

name: Albino Crypt Bear
textDefeated: You dispatch the bear and wonder if there are more lurking about.

name: Black Knight of The Vale
textDefeated: As he dies, he curses you and tells you that you will never defeat the dragon.

name: Elmearian Spy
textDefeated: He eats his information before he dies, so you learn nothing from him.

name: Stalking Shadow
textDefeated: You send the ceature back to where it came from.

name: Necromantic Archmagus
textDefeated: With his dying breath he explodes into a pillar of black flame!

name: Iron Golem
textDefeated: The golem seizes up and you push him over.

name: A Hell Hound
textDefeated: He bursts into flames and is sucked into the earth.

name: Guard from Eythgim Village
textDefeated: The people from that village seem angry!

name: Garden Gnome
textDefeated: Stupid garden gnomes. What are they doing in the forest anyway?

name: Chicken
textDefeated: Good fortune smiles upon you - you will eat well tonight.

name: Marksman
textDefeated: He took so long to aim, you just walked up and kicked him.

name: Enchanted Tissue Box
textDefeated: You pick up the box and put it in your pocket.  You never know when a tissue might come in handy.

name: Ghostly Woodsman
textDefeated: You aren't sure how you did it, but you killed something that was already dead.  Good for you.

name: Zombie
textDefeated: He really went to pieces, didn't he?

name: Fortula the Plains Cat
textDefeated: That plains cat is now plain dead.

name: Erin the Ninja Squirrel
textDefeated: That squirrel was a little crazy.

name: Nasty Nevin
textDefeated: Wrecked'em?  Darn near killed 'em!

name: Master Dragon Watcher
textDefeated: You wonder who watches the watchers.

name: Vampire in Bat Form
textDefeated: I vant to suk your blooood!

name: Lady of the Lake
textDefeated: Take that, you watery tart!

name: Bluebird of Happiness
textDefeated: Happiness is over-rated anyway.

name: Potato Newscaster
textDefeated: It's ok, he was just a common 'tater.

name: Pygmy Dragon
textDefeated: You hope he wasn't a relative of the Green Dragon.

name: Zealous Photographer
textDefeated: The things beautiful people have to put up with.

name: Gary Larson
textDefeated: You still don't get it.

name: Soldier from Eythgim Village
textDefeated: Eythgim seems to be waging a personal war with you.

name: 80''s Glam Rocker
textDefeated: You know your motto, Live and let die.

name: Vigilante
textDefeated: This carnage disgusts you.

name: The Devil
textDefeated: For being the Devil, he really wasn't so hot.

name: Rush Hour Driver
textDefeated: It was a no-win situation, speeding on these forest paths.  The driver had it coming.

name: Initiate Dragon Tamer
textDefeated: Good thing for you that pole only works on 10-foot dragons!

name: Vampire-Bat Prince
textDefeated: You thought bats were Republicans.

name: Mercenary
textDefeated: You could use an ale.

name: Magic Mirror
textDefeated: Mirror, Mirror, on the Ground, it is your death that you have found.

name: Broadway Extra
textDefeated: This extra is really on her own now.

name: Butter the Sprite
textDefeated: Butter?  What kind of a name is Butter?

name: Father Time
textDefeated: Your victory is not comforting. You know he will still catch up to you.

name: Eythgim Village Archers
textDefeated: The tree is  burning, you'd better try to put it out.

name: Animate Stormcloud
textDefeated: The storm is no more. You can see the light of day peeking through the last of the clouds.

name: Three Toed Sloth
textDefeated: Your swift moves were too fast for this sloth.

name: Death
textDefeated: There it is!  Death!!!!!

name: Everquest Junkie
textDefeated: D00d U pwned that guy!

name: Junior Dragon Tamer
textDefeated: If he cannot tell the difference between you and a dragon, he has much work to do.

name: Vampire Bat King
textDefeated: You decide to leave before the rest of the bats come to find their king.

name: Cerberus
textDefeated: Each one's breath was worse than the last.

name: Man from deep, deep, dark, dark, deep, dark woods
textDefeated: The creature from the deep, deep, dark, dark, deep, dark woods is finally dead.

name: Devil in a Blue Dress
textDefeated: You really prefer black dresses anyway.

name: Giant
textDefeated: Geeze, he almost fell on you!

name: Commander of the Eythgim Army
textDefeated: You have bested their army by killing its master.

name: Ice Dragon
textDefeated: You defeated him, but caught a cold.

name: Pushmi Pullyew
textDefeated: That strange creature couldn't tell if it was coming or going.

name: Whale
textDefeated: You know Violet isn't going to believe a Whale attacked you in the forest.

name: Gorma The Leper
textDefeated: It looks like the leper's fighting strategy has fallen apart...

name: King Agrippa
textDefeated: As you stare at his smoking corpse, you marvel at the ineffectiveness of flaming wingnuts.

name: Senior Dragon Tamer
textDefeated: You regret killing him. You wanted to see him make a dragon jump through that hoop.

name: Sorcerous Vampire
textDefeated: A cold shiver goes down your spine.  You would rather be with Violet.

name: Samurai Master
textDefeated: You bow to the fallen master before you walk away.

name: Bartender
textDefeated: That's not a Duck!  It's a Chicken!

name: Prince of Eythgim Village
textDefeated: You are not easily bribed, and he was a mortal enemy.

name: Loch Ness Monster
textDefeated: Why in the world would that monster be in this forest.  You must have been dreaming!

name: Fuzzie Wuzzie
textDefeated: Fuzzie Wuzzie wasn't very fuzzie, was he?

name: Ugly Harpy
textDefeated: Her breath was worse than her bite.

name: Field Mouse
textDefeated: That was some powerful mouse!

name: Ulysses Wulfgang
textDefeated: Death to lies!  Death to Ulysses Wulfgang!

name: Master Dragon Tamer
textDefeated: Once you killed the master, the dragon ran away

name: Seductive Vampiress
textDefeated: It was a shame to kill her.

name: Burly Man
textDefeated: Fantasize,  silencing her song. "Eeeh, Eeeh!"

name: Princess of Eythgim Village
textDefeated: She tried to tempt you, but you resisted.

name: Cyclops Warrior
textDefeated: The dead Cyclops' one eye stares at you blankly.

name: Cupid
textDefeated: You have slain Cupid. You shall never find true love.

name: Tabloid Writer
textDefeated: If you ask me, SHE was the six-armed alien who gave birth to the world's largest infant Elvis impersonator.

name: Evil Wizard
textDefeated: You have set the tortured souls free.

name: Artemis, Goddess of the Hunt'
textDefeated: The moon itself shall weep for the slain Artemis.

name: Centaur Archer
textDefeated: The twisted man-beast lies still.

name: Mime
textDefeated: His death is a rather sad charade.

name: Chili Chef
textDefeated: Man, that's good chili!

name: Le Chat dans le chapeau
textDefeated: In spanish, El Gato en el sombrero.

name: Dragon Rider in Training
textDefeated: They learn to ride dragons using a mechanical bull?

name: Frenzied vampire bats
textDefeated: Why are there so many darn bats in this forest?

name: Monarch of Eythgim Village
textDefeated: I guess this makes you king of their Village.

name: Brownie
textDefeated: The tiny warrior dies with a faint squeal.

name: Darkness
textDefeated: You are afraid of the dark no longer.

name: Mountain King
textDefeated: The King has died, long live the King!

name: Dragon Rider
textDefeated: A well-aimed strike grounds the flying dragon and his rider.

name: Vampirus,the Bat God
textDefeated: You are even more god-like then he!

name: Loneliness
textDefeated: What is the sound of one hand clapping?
textLost: 'What is the sound of one hand clapping?'

name: Loneliness
textDefeated: What is the sound of one hand clapping?
textLost: 'What is the sound of one hand clapping?'
